text: Henri "Hans" van den Broek (;In isolation, van and den are pronounced and , respectively. 11 December 1936 â€“ 22 February 2025) was a Dutch politician. From 1982 through 1993 as Minister of Foreign Affairs for the Ruud Lubbers cabinet. From 1970 till 1974 he was a member of the municipal council of Rheden. Van den Broek died on 22 February 2025 from problems caused by Alzheimer's disease at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Mr. H. title: Hans van den Broek
